definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
boat deck (upper deck on which lifeboats are stored)
boat deck (upper deck on which lifeboats are stored)

sentences.english: Each one set of pilot ladder near port and starboard of the main deck shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 主甲板的左右舷附近各安装一个引水员软梯。

sentences.english: Could we go below deck and have a look?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以下到甲板上看看吗？

sentences.english: Are scuppers on both ship decks effectively plugged?
sentences.chinese: 双方的甲板孔是否都已堵塞严密？

sentences.english: At the neck of the wrecked deck, the reckoner checked the opaque cheque.
sentences.chinese: 在遇险的甲板的脖子，计算者检查不透明的支票。

sentences.english: Since these decks have no under support, larger deck boards will not be as sturdy.
sentences.chinese: 由于这些甲板下更大的支持，无牌板将不再是坚固。

sentences.english: Repair leaking water pipe in starboard deck.
The straw ropes lay all over the ship's deck.
sentences.chinese: 船甲板上到处都是草绳。

sentences.english: All crew members assembled on boat deck and exercised abandon ship drill.
sentences.chinese: 全体船员在艇甲板上集合，进行弃船演习。

sentences.english: Deck is a mentalist's dream, come true.
sentences.chinese: 象征学甲板是一个精神论者梦想，实现。

sentences.english: The ship is designed to have continuous main deck, forecastle and poop.
sentences.chinese: 设计有一连续的主甲板和艏楼，艉楼。

sentences.english: The deck of the ship is canting gradually.
sentences.chinese: 船的甲板正在逐渐倾斜。

sentences.english: Are deck seals in good working order?
sentences.chinese: 甲板水封装置是否情况良好？

sentences.english: The jibs I speedily doused and brought tumbling to the deck, but the main-sail was a harder matter.
sentences.chinese: 我迅速放下三角帆扔到甲板上，但却难以对付主帆。

sentences.english: Four fixed rings need to be added on upper deck for derrick holds.
sentences.chinese: 吊货舱上层甲板上应装4个固定环。

sentences.english: Push it and the deck calibrates specifically for the blank tape you have just inserted.
sentences.chinese: 明确地为你仅仅有插入的空白音带推动它和甲板校正。

definition: sides of a ship/ship's railing/fig. the dividing line between shipboard expenses and onshore freight charges
the bow or prow of a ship
